remarks: Property deduction for univariate polynomial base set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ply1baspropd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
ply1baspropd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` S ) ) $.
ply1baspropd.p $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) $.
ply1baspropd $p |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` S ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
